channel.title: Comments on: A Photo A Day

item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: I'm in mourning! So sad (though I most certainly understand) that you are putting "a photo per day" to rest(for the time being.) I contemplated doing it in 2008 but instead opted for "Project 52," a photo per week.
item.content:encoded:
I’m in mourning! So sad (though I most certainly understand) that you are putting “a photo per day” to rest(for the time being.)
I contemplated doing it in 2008 but instead opted for “Project 52,” a photo per week.
